text: wystejlk- 'ayuha alrswl- kafaar quraysh -lshdt jhlhm- bialeadhab aldhy andhrthm bih lmma 'asaruu ealaa alkfr, walan yukhlif allah ma waeadahum bih min aleadhab fla bdd min wqweh, waqad ejjal lahum fi aldyna dhlk fi yawm "bdr". wa'iina ywmana min al'ayam eind allah - wahu yawm alqyamt- ka'alf sanat mimaa taeuddun min suniyin aldnya
